Package controller

Class ScoreController

java.lang.Object
controller.ScoreController
public class ScoreController
extends java.lang.Object
New class that uses ScoreModel to implement read method.

Creates an instance of ScoreView to update and display as the score changes. Implements methods to update score and return score both as String or Integer. The score allocated at the start of the first level is zero.

Author:
hcysu1

    • getBinding

      public static javafx.beans.binding.StringBinding getBinding()
      asString() creates a StringBinding that holds the value of score turned into a String. If the value of score changes, the value of StringBinding will be updated automatically.
      Returns:
      score as StringBinding
